descriptionNullable: The set contains 2445 signature samples. Signatures belong to 22 users, the target parameter - user ID - is in the first column. The following contains information about the first 8 components of the Fourier expansion for the measured parameters. It captures two tablet coordinates (x, y), pen lift height (z), tablet pressure (p), and pen tilt angles relative to the far edge of the tablet and the vertical axis (a, t). Similar components are also calculated for the first and second derivatives of these parameters (speeds and accelerations of their change). The result is a set of 6*8*3=144 parameters describing the signature instance. More details on the parameters and their application can be found in works **Kostyuchenko, E., Gurakov, M., Krivonosov, E., Tomyshev, M., Mescheryakov, R., & Hodashinskiy, I. (2016, July). Integration of Bayesian classifier and perceptron for problem identification on dynamics signature using a genetic algorithm for the identification threshold selection. In International Symposium on Neural Networks (pp. 620-627). Springer, Cham.** and **Hodashinsky, I. A., Kostyuchenko, E. Y., Sarin, K. S., Anfilofev, A. E., Bardamova, M. B., Samsonov, S. S., & Filimonenko, I. V. (2018). Dynamic-signature-based user authentication using a fuzzy classifier. Computer Optics, 42(4), 657-666.**.
title: Signature_Dynamics
subtitle: Dynamic Signature Features Dataset
description: The set contains 2445 signature samples. Signatures belong to 22 users, the target parameter - user ID - is in the first column. The following contains information about the first 8 components of the Fourier expansion for the measured parameters. It captures two tablet coordinates (x, y), pen lift height (z), tablet pressure (p), and pen tilt angles relative to the far edge of the tablet and the vertical axis (a, t). Similar components are also calculated for the first and second derivatives of these parameters (speeds and accelerations of their change). The result is a set of 6*8*3=144 parameters describing the signature instance. More details on the parameters and their application can be found in works **Kostyuchenko, E., Gurakov, M., Krivonosov, E., Tomyshev, M., Mescheryakov, R., & Hodashinskiy, I. (2016, July). Integration of Bayesian classifier and perceptron for problem identification on dynamics signature using a genetic algorithm for the identification threshold selection. In International Symposium on Neural Networks (pp. 620-627). Springer, Cham.** and **Hodashinsky, I. A., Kostyuchenko, E. Y., Sarin, K. S., Anfilofev, A. E., Bardamova, M. B., Samsonov, S. S., & Filimonenko, I. V. (2018). Dynamic-signature-based user authentication using a fuzzy classifier. Computer Optics, 42(4), 657-666.**.
